title: Install
content:
Installing sttradsfasdf #  Quick installasdfadsf #  You can run the below curl to install it somewhere in your PATH for easy use. Ideally it will be installed at ./bin folder
curl -sfL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/abhimanyu003/sttr/main/install.sh | sh Homebrew #  If you are on macOS and using Homebrew, you can install sttr with the following:
brew tap abhimanyu003/sttr brew install sttr Go #  go install github.com/abhimanyu003/sttr@latest Manually #  Download the pre-compiled binaries from the Release! page and copy them to the desired location.
